answers.answer: Okay, I saw this and I'm not due during this time frame, not till April, but my son will be 3 on August 12th.  I love summer babies!  Hang in there, not much longer to wait!
I am due September 2nd!! Well sept 9th but they're taking her sept 2nd because shes so big already!! How are you feeling? Just this past week all the sudden I got miserable :/

I am miserable too!!!  I am wicked, poor dh.  I am due Sept 2nd w/ our lil man Kannan.  I cannot wait.  I have gained 39lbs, am anemic, have gestational diabetes, the baby has an echogenic spot on his heart, and I am cranky cranky cranky.....but we have a baby on the way and somehow none of this will matter in a few weeks!!!  good luck to all of you.

Does anything need to be done about his spot on the heart or are they going to just keep an eye on him??? Wow, Sept is now just around the corner. I am so happy for you and all other soon to be delivered Mommy's.  I am kind of grateful that my butterball is going to be a winter baby. I would hate to be 8-9 months along in this damn heat.  102 in Chciago today! YikesLove and hugs, Kelly

Awww you're due the same time I am! Congrats! I'm sorry to hear you're going through all of that. I was blessed to escape the diabetes, they thought I had it but luckily just was normal high. Yes, in a few weeks none of this stuff will matter its just making it through the last few weeks lol! We can do it!!!!

Hi~I'm due on sept.11th with my 5th child,another girl,so that'll be 4 girls,and a son.I've been having these horrible braxton hicks for about 2 weeks.They hurt !! They feel like how a 6 cm contraction feels like,and last up to 4 minutes.I'm measuring big for dates [measuring 38 weeks],so maybe I'm dilating slowly and this'll be an august baby.
My dr said at 36 weeks I will be seen every week. That's weird. Maybe ask her about it?
If I didn't lose my little one in March, I would have been due Aug 26th. I still find myself counting down the days...

kelly, I dont know about the spot right at the moment.  The drs are telling us that there is no other markers for Downs so it is just a normal variant.  I would think we will know when he is born and if there are signs then I think we go from there.  we are praying and praying and praying...i do believe its best to have a winter baby..haha...good luck

I am due August the 25. I am anxious to. My Dr is still seeing me every 2 weeks. I thought after a certain amount of weeks, the Dr starts seeing you every week. I went in 2 weeks ago and the Dr didn't even check me. All the did was check for the bacteria that could pass from mom to baby when delivering. My next appointment is Tuesday of next week. Is this normal? ALl she did was tell me what to do if I went into labor.

Yes, I have been swimming a lot and all of a sudden my sleep is worse, My back hurts and I don't feel like leaving the house at all (granted it is +110 with the humidity factor here in VA).  I am  tired of my big belly and yikes! I barely make it to the bathroom in the middle of the night.  I am going to have to buy Depends LOL!

I am sorry about how you are feeling--I have been there too.  I would have had a baby in July 2003 but lost it early on. I would go to these parties with my hubby every summer and all of these women there had kids and I was the only one without kids--got tired of having to explain myself to everyone so I stopped going.  It is hard but your day will come...mine did after a long time and I still cannot believe it.GOod luck to you!

Hi, I am dure Sept 1st (or Aug 30th depending on the doctor) and our little guy has been measuring a week and a half bigger all along so by the u/s my edd could have been changed to Aug 24th but they left it. I am on bedrest now for high bp and major swelling!! I am also 75% effaced and 1cm dilated maybe I will go early hehe wishful thinking :)

Hey, all!I'm due September 17th, but I have a feeling I'm gonna be early.  I was two days early with our first son, six days early with the second.  Of course, this little one could always surprise us and arrive two weeks late--agghh!!Here's hoping everyone has a safe delivery!

question: Just curious as to whom is ready to hatch this month/next month.My  edd is 9/14/06 with a girl, Ameera --she is my first.  I am anxious to get this over with and hold my little munchkin!
title: Who is due this August / September?
